Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to a Braille option for all identification cards
Summary: Relates to a Braille option for all identification cards.
LawCode: Add ยง3, Bank L; add ยง397-b, Gen Bus L; add ยง24, Soc Serv L; add ยง313, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, the general business law, the social services law and the insurance law, in relation to a braille option for all identifications cards
